item.title: How to Implement Meshgrid in PyTorch
item.description: In this post, I’ll show how to implement meshgrid in PyTorch. The following graph shows what a meshgrid would be in numpy: Image credit: https://www.python-course.eu/matplotlib_contour_plot.php If we have two tensors x and y: >>> x = torch.from_numpy(np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])) >>> y = torch.from_numpy(np.array([11, 22, 33, 44])) We’d like a tensor z with shape [4, 4, 2] in which z[i, j] is the concatenation of x[i] and y[j]. >>> xx = x.
